through the internet you can stream

now with cryptocurrency the same thing
that's happening we're in the beginning

there let's invest in this it'll just

already they're developing all different

they're trying to tell you something
it's always the
it now the former CEO of Intuit said

and warned people not to fall for it
it's a colossal pump and dump scheme he
said I'm tired of saying be careful it's
speculative then be careful it's
gambling then be careful it's a bubble
okay I'll say it
bitcoin is a scam he went on to say it's

because if we look at the stock market

has the market been pumped up then
dumped I mean think about this for a
second this just shouldn't happen once
it just didn't happen twice
it happened many times now if I go back

we don't need what they setup this is

this is no good stay away from it I mean
think about what they've told us in the

triple-a they turned out to be complete
and utter

they're gonna continually push this now

it was just given to them and after
